document_data.name: Prosperity House
document_data.mainbody: '''Prosperity House''' was a sprawling complex located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The complex was located in south Zhentil Keep in the eastern section of the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] on [[Zhent Avenue]].
document_data.Description: Prosperity House included others buildings such as [[Silverguild Manor]], the [[Prosperity Emporium]], the [[Prosperity Caravan Company]], and warehouses and staging grounds for the caravans.
document_data.Inhabitants: A merchant named [[Malvred Silverguild]] owned the entire complex.
